SHAIN ROSE

BLURB

[[My]0-i father 's business partner]161-my father 's business partner will do anything for [the empire [they]163-they built together]162-the empire they built together … Even marry [me]0-i .

[Declan Hardy]39-declan , [all - American heartthrob]164-all - american heartthrob and [retired NFL billionaire]165-retired nfl billionaire , is [my]0-i complete opposite . [He]39-declan 's commanding where [I]0-i 'm cooperative . Spontaneous while [I]0-i am deliberate . Loud when [I]0-i stay quiet . The only thing [we]166-we have in common is that both [our]166-we names are on [[my]0-i father]167-my father 's will .

[He]39-declan 'll inherit the fitness and hospitality empire and [I]0-i 'll keep the one thing [I]0-i hold dear . As long as [I]0-i marry [him]39-declan — with conditions .

One year of a fake marriage . One year of living together . One year of pretending [I]0-i belong in [his]39-declan luxury lifestyle .

But stipulations are never that simple . Especially when [I]0-i ca n't tell if [his]39-declan kisses are fake or if [I]0-i 'm pretending when [I]0-i kiss [him]39-declan back . And as more conditions arise , it 's clear there 's a fine line between commitment and betrayal ... and neither of [us]166-we knows where that line falls .

NOTE ON CONTENT WARNINGS

As [a reader who loves surprises]168-a reader who loves surprises , [I]0-i enjoy going in blind with each book . Yet , [I]0-i also want to give [[my]0-i readers]169-my readers the opportunity to know what sensitive content may be in [my]0-i books . [You]170-you will find the list of them here : https://www.shainrose.com/content-warnings

EVERLY

6

13

42

[EPILOGUE

EVERLY]145-epilogue everly
